channel.title: Cornwall on Coffee now
channel.description: Recent content in Cornwall on Coffee now

item.title: Scones
item.description: I’m writing this on ‘National Cream Tea Day’ not long after I succumbed to scone fever with two recent events requiring the baking of scones. However, it’s not me doing the baking - James is the one who’s rather good at scones - so much so, I call his scones ‘the clouds’. Hence, another recipe-sharing blog post…
